Synopsis: Creates a new chart legend with customizable options.
Description: The New-ChartLegend function creates a new chart legend with various customization options such as position, alignment, font settings, and more.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
New-ChartLegend -Names @('A', 'B', 'C') -Color @('red', 'blue', 'green') -LegendPosition 'top' -HorizontalAlign 'center' -FontSize 12
Creates a new chart legend with three items ('A', 'B', 'C') in red, blue, and green colors positioned at the top with center alignment and font size of 12.
